QuestData.Title: Malfurion's Fury
QuestData.Description: The loss of Cenarius to the nightmare is a devastating blow to us all.$b$bThough Malfurion's rage is justified, his hatred of Xavius has burned for centuries and I fear that his blind rage will be used as a weapon against him.$b$bMay Elune guide us in our search for him, lest we have yet another friend to mourn today.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ysera to search for Malfurion.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, $n...$b$bWhat is becoming of this precious land?
